document_data.name: Ch'kk'ch
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Ch'kk'ch''''' was the daughter of [[Ma Festina]] and an inhabitant of the [[Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''Cool. Seriously cool. My favorite [[fireworks]] color is, like, dark violet, because it's the most cool!''|Ch'kk'ch}}
document_data.Description: Like her mother, Ch'kk'ch was a [[human]] girl with a light skin tone. But unlike Ma, she had dark red hair, and her eyes were blue.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, as the [[Cult of the Absolute]] menaced the city of Baldur's Gate, Festina brought her daughter to a performance of some showy magics by three spellslingers, on the [[Murl's Rest]] plaza in front of [[Sorcerous Sundries]]. The mother was delighted by her daughter's joy seeing the magical show. It was the most fun the girl had since her birthday.
